description.action: Evan, still in his owl form, hoots softly as he approaches the captive children. His large eyes are filled with concern, and he gently nuzzles them, encouraging them to follow.
Isaac, the koala, climbs closer to the captives, his soft fur brushing against them. He lets out a low, soothing sound, trying to comfort the frightened children.
Aaron, the small dinosaur, stands guard, his sharp eyes scanning the dungeon for any threats. He makes a series of gentle, rumbling noises, encouraging the captives to follow.
Aurelia, the panda, approaches the captives with a caring expression. She nuzzles them gently, her large eyes filled with compassion, and begins to lead the way out of the dungeon.
